alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 01 at 2:43PM EDT until April 01 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 40 to 45 mph expected along the immediate coast. * WHERE...Portions of southeast North Carolina and northeast South Carolina. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender
